sense.def:
One's dealings with a person or organization
so odnosi ali poslovanje z neko osebo ali organizacijo.

seg.quote: Ford insists that Carter's dealings with him have been totally correct.
He was questioned about his past business dealings.

sense.def:
Dealing
se nanaša na kupovanje in prodajanje stvari kot obliko trgovanja. Na primer:
antique dealing
se nanaša na kupovanje in prodajo starin.
